archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.4: Risk assessment methodologies should be aligned to produce an appropriate method for conducting information risk assessments of ICS environments in a collaborative manner, including analysis and presentation on the risk:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
